profile.name: Rob Pike
profile.headline: Senior Software Engineer at Netflix | Open Source Enthusiast
profile.summary: Highly motivated and experienced software engineer with a passion for open-source development. Skilled in Go programming language, database sharding, and standard library improvements.

experience.title: Senior Software Engineer at Netflix
description: Leading the development of high-performance systems using Go.
Collaborating with cross-functional teams to deliver scalable and reliable solutions.

experience.title: Freelance Developer
description: Developing and maintaining open-source projects, including ivy, an APL-like calculator.
Fixing issues, implementing new features, and proposing changes to the Go standard library.

experience.title: Open Source Maintainer
description: Contributing to open-source projects, including bug fixes and feature enhancements.
Collaborating with other maintainers to ensure project stability and growth.

Standard Library Improvements: Space- and memory- and time-efficient set type
